text: New Year's Evil is a 1980 American horror thriller movie directed by Emmett Alston and starring Roz Kelly, Kip Niven, Grant Cramer, Louisa Moritz, Taaffe O'Connell, Teri Copley. It was distributed by Cannon Group. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1980 horror movies Category:1980s horror thriller movies Category:American horror thriller movies Category:American independent movies
title: New Year's Evil
